txt.en: You have created a great deal of havoc on the tall ships of the Corsairs anchored off of Hashadîr.
You have created a great deal of havoc on the tall ships of the Corsairs anchored off of Hashadîr.
The tall ships off the beach of Hashadîr can be reached by taking the last rowboat.\n\nYou should take the last rowboat to the tall ships.
Take the last rowboat to the tall ships
Barrels of pitch and treasure-chests can be found on the tall ships of the Corsairs off the beach of Hashadîr.\n\nYou should burn the pitch and destroy the treasure chests.
You should do whatever you can to wreak havoc upon the tall ships anchored off the shore of southern Belfalas.
You should do whatever you can to wreak havoc upon the tall ships anchored off the shore of southern Belfalas.
